## RefKeyRootProps type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RefKeyRootProps<GRefKey extends string = 'ref'> = {
    [P in Exclude<GRefKey, 'key'>]: Ref<any>;
} & {
    css: Interpolation | ((theme: any) => Interpolation);
    key: string;
    children: ReactNode;
} & PlainObject;
```
